EmailTemplate.name: Online Enrollment, Contract Acknowloment Form, and Statement of Work (1327077253
EmailTemplate.subject: Online Enrollment, Contract Acknowloment Form, and Statement of Work (1327077253.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Ann,
So nice speaking with you. To summarize our call:
· Please complete the online enrollment. At the end, an I-9 will populate; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.)
· As MBO is not signing the contract with the client you will need to sign Contract Acknowledgement Form and send back to me via email.
· I have attached a blank SOW for the client to fill out so we have all the information needed to set up the project in the MBO system.
Please feel free to reach out to me directly with any and all questions.
Thanks Ann, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
